bibl.title: Roman and Early Byzantine Coins from Naqlun.
bibl.note: 33 bronze (copper) coins found during the investigations conducted by the Polish Archaeological Mission since 1986.
LICHOCKA Barbara, Roman and Early Byzantine Coins from Naqlun.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 167-182, 2 tabl., 5 pll.
